message: Let's be fair and end this quickly!
My turn to propose something. This is a good deal for you considering the inflation!
Considering inflation, this is a better deal than last round. Take it!
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is my final offer!
Don't bluff, we both lose if we don't agree soon. This is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
Okay, Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer benefits us both. Take it or leave it!
